summary: This mod is simply an overhaul of Skjor's appearance of the Companion's Guild if you want a more youthful looking Skjor.
descriptionHtml:
Hi! As stated, this is a mod for anyone who would rather have a more youthful looking Skjor from the Companion's Guild. I made this mod simply because I couldn't find another one to suit my taste and then, afterward, decided to upload it. This mod includes the hair and facial changes, NOT the change in his armor.

REQUIREMENTS:
To use this mod you need to have Apachii Sky Hair downloaded which can be found at:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

SUGGESTIONS:
To make him look like the picture, I also recommend these mods to go along with it.

Beards - High Resolution, which can be found at:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?

True Brows, which can be found at:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?

SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and Real Feet Meshes, which can be found at:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58443/?

Like I said, this is the first mod I have published, so if there are any problems or questions, just post a comment and I will do my best to answer!
author: squigmo14
